frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-yakuake
frozen.shortDescription: A Gnome shell extension to use Yakuake on Gnome. Adds a global shortcut to show/hide yakuake and makes the console appear focussed.
frozen.longDescription: A Gnome shell extension to use Yakuake on Gnome. Adds a global shortcut to show/hide yakuake and makes the console appear focussed.
